title: There's More To Getting In Shape Than How You Look
description:
Exercise is important, but balancing exercise with mental health and your own body confidence can be a tricky thing to pull off.

In this episode, we talk to experts about how to keep comfortable in your body as it changes, and how to find that balance while exercising.

itunes:title: There's More To Getting In Shape Than How You Look
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Your fitness journey isn't just physical — it's mental and emotional, too. In this episode, we'll give you the tools to stay mentally healthy while exercising.
